medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute onset constant right lower quadrant (RLQ) pain
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began acutely at 5am this morning, waking the patient from sleep. The pain is constant and located in the RLQ. The patient denies fever, chills, nausea, and vomiting but reports anorexia.
medical_history.family_history: Denies family history of gastrointestinal disorders
